attributes.action: Condemn Israel and stop them from hurting innocent civillians in Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to help save Gaza make our people count as humans who really wan to help change the world . Please save Gaza by asking the Government to try and condemn Israeal and find a solution to this. Israel should not be trying to take land which is not rightfully theirs to have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
